full_summary:
Government of Canada (CO) Contractor Notice
#Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
Local Access Service for Alberta and British Columbia
This notice is issued by the Shared Services Canada (SAS) according to the Government Contracts Regulations. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) will apply to this procurement.

**Notice Details:**

* **Contract Title**: Local Access Service for Alberta and British Columbia
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01017072
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Notice Date**: December 13, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 27, 2022 @ 02:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

**Procurement Details:**
The Contracting Entity, Shared Services Canada (SAS), has a requirement for the provision of Local Access Service (LAS) to the Government of Canada with offices located across Alberta and British Columbia, including remote locations. The scope of work includes migrating existing LAS lines to wireless and Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) solutions.

**Pre-Selected Contractor:**
The proposed Contractor for this requirement is Telus Communications Inc. The proposed contract period will commence on December 31, 2023, and will be for up to ten years.

**Exclusion from Trade Agreements**: This procurement is excluded from the application of international trade agreements to which Canada is party. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) will apply to this procurement.

**Supplier Information:**
Suppliers who consider themselves to be fully qualified and available to provide the services described in this notice may submit a Statement of Capabilities in writing to Shared Services Canada, by the closing date of this notice. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate that the supplier meets the requirements described below.

**Essential Requirements:**

*   A minimum of 10 years of experience in delivering complex, feature-rich local access services
*   At least 5 years of experience in delivering local access services within the last 10 years for the given geographic areas
*   The supplier must have at least 5 years of experience in supporting at least 50% of the volume of total approximate local access lines across the applicable geographic region

**Security Requirement:** This ACAN contains a requirement for vendor and personnel security screening.

Please note that the Government of Canada has determined that only one supplier, Telus Communications Inc., has the experience and necessary infrastructure to deliver the required services to the required locations. Suppliers may inquire or submit a statement of capabilities to Jean
